class code_SemperKI.connections.cmem.ManageToken¶

_token¶
client¶
__getattr__(item)¶
__del__()¶
getAccessToken()¶

Get initial token. Made as a function to be callable from outside. Reminder for me: It makes no sense to save this access token in redis because it expires much to quickly!

checkIfExpired()¶

Check if token has expired and if so, refresh it.
